game.name: Monster Path
game.shortDescription: A procedurally generated monster collecting roguelike-JRPG with stacking power ups, a 2.5D storybook fantasy art style, and a dynamic score
game.shortDescriptionEn: A procedurally generated monster collecting roguelike-JRPG with stacking power ups, a 2.5D storybook fantasy art style, and a dynamic score

reviewHighlights.text: I'm the game's composer and I think we did a pretty good job
This game plays way too slow. It should have a speed-up-option and a skip animation option.
